solution_line_template: When he gave {seashells_given_friends} seashells to his friends, Ali had {initial_seashells}-{seashells_given_friends}= <<{initial_seashells}-{seashells_given_friends}={after_friends}>>{after_friends} seashells.

When he gave another {seashells_given_brothers} seashells to his brothers, he had {after_friends}-{seashells_given_brothers} = <<{after_friends}-{seashells_given_brothers}={after_brothers}>>{after_brothers} seashells
He also sold half of the seashells, a total of 1/{sold_fraction_denominator}*{after_brothers} = <<{seashells_sold}={seashells_sold}>>{seashells_sold} seashells
